item.title: Tension erupts in Rangpur-6 after recovery of six ballot papers
item.description: Tension flared on Monday morning after six tampered ballot papers and two seals were recovered from a polling station in Pirganj Upazila of the Rangpur-6 constituency. The incident occurred at Hasarpara Government Primary School polling station in Madankhali Union. Locals said some students who a

item.title: Italy says it stands ready to train police in Gaza
item.description: Italy stands ready to help train police forces in Gaza and elsewhere in the Palestinian territories, its foreign minister said on Monday, as Rome aims to play a role in stabilising the Middle East. “We are ready to train a new Gaza police force, and we are also ready to train a Palestinian p

item.title: Uttara Bank opens its 50th sub branch in Moulvibazar
item.description: Uttara Bank PLC has inaugurated the 50th sub branch of the bank at Shamshernagar in Kamolganj in Moulvibazar district, according to a press release. Mr. Khandaker Ali Samnoon, Deputy Managing Director of Uttara Bank PLC, inaugurated the ‘Shamshernagar Sub Branch’ at a function on Monda

item.title: Amid criticism, Law Adviser lists ministry’s steps since taking charge
item.description: Law Adviser Dr. Asif Nazrul has outlined a wide range of legal and institutional reforms carried out by the Ministry of Law, Justice and Parliamentary Affairs since the July mass uprising, amid criticism over his role. item.title: Prime Bank holds ‘Empowering Youth’ seminar at Gazipur Agricultural University
item.description: Under the initiative of its flagship platform PrimeAcademia, Prime Bank PLC recently organized a seminar titled “Empowering Youth” at Gazipur Agricultural University (GAU), in collaboration with GAU and the GAU Career Club. item.title: 459 temporary CCC employees granted permanent status
item.description: A total of 459 temporary employees of Chattogram City Corporation (CCC) have been granted permanent status. Mayor Dr Shahadat Hossain announced the decision while addressing a meeting with the employees at the corporation’s head office in Tiger Pass . The employees, who had been working on

item.title: ONE Bank outlines strategic priorities for 2026
item.description: ONE Bank PLC has outlined its strategic priorities for the year 2026 at a Strategic Leadership Meet held recently at the Radisson Blu Water Garden Hotel, Dhaka. item.title: NRBC Bank rewards 66 branches and sub branches for achieving over 100pc in CASA drive
item.description: NRBC Bank Awards 66 Branches for achieving more than 100 per cent of their targets in collecting Current and Savings Accounts (CASA), which are low- and no-cost deposits. According to a press release, the certificates were handed over to the Heads of branch and sub-branch by the Chairman of the ba

item.title: Bangladesh’s newly elected MPs to take oath on Tuesday
item.description: Newly elected MPs are set to take oath as members of the 13th parliament and also the Constitution Reform Council on Tuesday. Chief Election Commissioner AMM Nasir Uddin will administer the oath in line with the Constitution as the posts of Speaker and Deputy Speaker of the 12th Parliament are cur

item.title: Al-Arafah Islami Bank signs deal with Seamax Ltd
item.description: Al-Arafah Islami Bank PLC, the country’s one of the leading Shariah-based banks, has signed a Memorandum of Understanding with Seamax Limited, according to a press release. item.title: SC stays HC order on Ramadan school closure
item.description: The Appellate Division of the Supreme Court (SC) on Monday stayed a High Court (HC) order that had directed to close the government and non-government secondary and lower secondary schools from February 18 in observance of the Holy month of Ramadan. item.title: NCP signs July National Charter, CA extends thanks
item.description: National Citizen Party (NCP) has signed the July National Charter, giving it compete shape on the aspects of approval of all stakeholders.
